It was all about self defense.  Tucson had learned that a hero never made t=
he first blow and he was not about to do that now.  So with complete silenc=
e, poise, and focus, he closes his optics, stands perfectly straight, and d=
rags his right foot across the ground in a slow semi circle in front of whe=
re he stands.  This blossoms into a graceful and fluid form of a meditative=
 exercise similar to Tai Chi.  He implements his katana in the tranquil dan=
ce as a dew drop falls from a branch from a tree that hangs over him.  The =
drop lands on his sword but does not spatter.  It rolls in perfect form, ov=
er the blade, which is lowered to the ground as the dew drop lands perfectl=
y intact to a fern leaf.  This maneuver was known as INNER PEACE.  The most=
 ancient tricks in the history of Kung Fu, which was also taught in Ninjabo=
t training.  So as Tucson maneuvers once again, his sword braces for impact=
 as he retains a highly meditative state.

Perpetually on the move and cons=
tantly busy. 

On Sep 5, 2011, at 7:58 AM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@gm=
ail.com> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Tucson barely has enough time to react b=
ut manages to leap up from the tree,
> > and gains just enough air to perfo=
rm a backwards vault over the shot that
> > Grimlock deployed, at the same =
time he clears the falling trees and lands
> > with legs and feet spread wi=
de enough for him to lower his body nearly to
> > the ground. Yet the tip o=
f his left wing still takes some damage, Tucson
> > does manage to literall=
y dodge the bullet.
> >
> > " Not bad, so close but yet so far. So, Grimloc=
k, what else do you have
> > besides that fuel consuming energy weapon of y=
ours? Surely you've been
> > upgraded with more sophisticated skills other =
than what you have, don't
> > you?"
> >
> > He is quick to whirl the sword =
into his hand.
> >
> > " Big guns only shoot so far before they run out of =
power. Now, let's try
> > that again shall we?"
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> There is li=
ttle response from the large Dinobots, save for a renewed savagery!
> 
> GR=
IMLOCK just snarled, his optics a bright red anger evident across
> his fac=
e. There is again little reaction to TUSCON's taunts except
> that he pulle=
d out his rather large energy sword in hand, the air
> sparking as it came =
to life.
> 
> SLAG on the other hand looked almost happy that TUSCON had do=
dged the
> first blow as he also pulled out his own sword, which was only
>=
 slightly smaller than GRIMLOCK's own blade.
> 
> The dinobots may lack TUS=
CON's specialized training in ninjabot
> techniques, but they have been fig=
hting in wars, battles and
> skirmishes for many more times then he has bee=
n alive and are well
> versed in the fighting arts of war!
> 
> SLUDGE and =
SNARL come in with biting attacks, their teeth razor sharp
> and their jaws=
 powerfully strong as GRIMLOCK and SLAG attempt to hack
> at TUSCON!
> 
> (=
TAG)
> 
> Preston
>

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>It was all about self defense.  T=
ucson had learned that a hero never made the first blow and he was not abou=
t to do that now.  So with complete silence, poise, and focus, he clos=
es his optics, stands perfectly straight, and drags his right foot across t=
he ground in a slow semi circle in front of where he stands.  This blo=
ssoms into a graceful and fluid form of a meditative exercise similar to Ta=
i Chi.  He implements his katana in the tranquil dance as a dew drop f=
alls from a branch from a tree that hangs over him.  The drop lands on=
 his sword but does not spatter.  It rolls in perfect form, over the b=
lade, which is lowered to the ground as the dew drop lands perfectly intact=
 to a fern leaf.  This maneuver was known as INNER PEACE.  The mo=
st ancient tricks in the history of Kung Fu, which was also taught in Ninja=
bot training.  So as Tucson maneuvers once again, his sword braces for=
 impact as he retains a highly meditative state.<br><br>Perpetually on the =
move and constantly busy. </div><div><br>On Sep 5, 2011, at 7:58 AM, S=
uper Cyclonus <<a href=3D"mailto:supercyclonus@...">supercyclonus@=
gmail.com</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div><blockquote type=3D"cite">=

-text">
      
      
      <p>> <OLD><br>
><br>
> Tucson ba=
rely has enough time to react but manages to leap up from the tree,<br>
&gt=
; and gains just enough air to perform a backwards vault over the shot that=
<br>
> Grimlock deployed, at the same time he clears the falling trees a=
nd lands<br>
> with legs and feet spread wide enough for him to lower hi=
s body nearly to<br>
> the ground.  Yet the tip of his left wing still t=
akes some damage, Tucson<br>
> does manage to literally dodge the bullet=
.<br>
><br>
> " Not bad, so close but yet so far.  So, Grimlock, what=
 else do you have<br>
> besides that fuel consuming energy weapon of you=
rs?  Surely you've been<br>
> upgraded with more sophisticated skills ot=
her than what you have, don't<br>
> you?"<br>
><br>
> He is quick =
to whirl the sword into his hand.<br>
><br>
> " Big guns only shoot s=
o far before they run out of power.  Now, let's try<br>

ll we?"<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
There is little response from the lar=
ge Dinobots, save for a renewed savagery!<br>
<br>
GRIMLOCK just snarled, h=
is optics a bright red anger evident across<br>
his face. There is again li=
ttle reaction to TUSCON's taunts except<br>
that he pulled out his rather l=
arge energy sword in hand, the air<br>
sparking as it came to life.<br>
<br=
>
SLAG on the other hand looked almost happy that TUSCON had dodged the<br>=

first blow as he also pulled out his own sword, which was only<br>
slightl=
y smaller than GRIMLOCK's own blade.<br>
<br>
The dinobots may lack TUSCON'=
s specialized training in ninjabot<br>
techniques, but they have been fight=
ing in wars, battles and<br>
skirmishes for many more times then he has bee=
n alive and are well<br>
versed in the fighting arts of war!<br>
<br>
SLUDG=
E and SNARL come in with biting attacks, their teeth razor sharp<br>
and th=
eir jaws powerfully strong as GRIMLOCK and SLAG attempt to hack<br>

ON!<br>
